title: [Large-scale] Mixed-Methods Evaluation Design for Technology-Integrated Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and smartphone utilization skills
context.additional_context: Mixed-Methods Research Application to Evaluate and Improve Smartphone-Integrated Mathematics Education for Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can evaluate the effectiveness of technology-integrated mathematics lesson designs using the Triple E Framework criteria
Learners enhance their ability to design and implement mathematics projects using smartphone apps in restricted technology environments
Learners can analyze the outcomes of technology-integrated education by utilizing mixed research methods (quantitative and qualitative data analysis)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
